name: YouTube
natural_language_description: 这是 YouTube 节点。主要用于: Consume YouTube API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: channel
available_options: Channel (值: channel)
Playlist (值: playlist)
Playlist Item (值: playlistItem)
Video (值: video)
Video Category (值: videoCategory)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many video categories
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

part.name: part
part.description: The fields parameter specifies a comma-separated list of one or more video resource properties that the API response will include
part.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 作用: The fields parameter specifies a comma-separated list of one or more video resource properties that the API response will include | 默认值: ['*'] | (必填项)
available_options: Content Details (值: contentDetails)
ID (值: id)
Live Streaming Details (值: liveStreamingDetails)
Localizations (值: localizations)
Player (值: player)
Recording Details (值: recordingDetails)
Snippet (值: snippet)
Statistics (值: statistics)
Status (值: status)
Topic Details (值: topicDetails)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 25

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: channelId (值: None) - The channelId parameter indicates that the API response should only contain resources created by the channel
forDeveloper (值: None) - Whether to restrict the search to only retrieve videos uploaded via the developer's application or website
publishedAfter (值: None) - The publishedAfter parameter indicates that the API response should only contain resources created at or after the specified time
publishedBefore (值: None) - The publishedBefore parameter indicates that the API response should only contain resources created before or at the specified time
q (值: None) - The q parameter specifies the query term to search for
regionCode (值: None) - The regionCode parameter instructs the API to select a video chart available in the specified region. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
relatedToVideoId (值: None) - The relatedToVideoId parameter retrieves a list of videos that are related to the video that the parameter value identifies
videoCategoryId (值: None) - The videoCategoryId parameter identifies the video category for which the chart should be retrieved
videoSyndicated (值: None) - Whether to restrict a search to only videos that can be played outside youtube.com
videoType (值: None) - The videoType parameter lets you restrict a search to a particular type of videos

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: order (值: None)
safeSearch (值: None)

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel ID | 作用: ID of the channel | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: defaultLanguage (值: None) - The language of the text in the playlist resource's title and description properties. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
description (值: None) - The playlist's description
embeddable (值: None) - Whether the video can be embedded on another website
license (值: None) - The video's license
notifySubscribers (值: None) - Whether YouTube should send a notification about the new video to users who subscribe to the video's channel
privacyStatus (值: None) - The playlist's privacy status
publicStatsViewable (值: None) - Whether the extended video statistics on the video's watch page are publicly viewable
publishAt (值: None) - If you set a value for this property, you must also set the status.privacyStatus property to private
recordingDate (值: None) - The date and time when the video was recorded
selfDeclaredMadeForKids (值: None) - Whether the video is designated as child-directed, and it contains the current "made for kids" status of the video
tags (值: None) - Keyword tags associated with the playlist. Mulplie can be defined separated by comma.

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

playlistId.name: playlistId
playlistId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
playlistId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Playlist Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

videoId.name: videoId
videoId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Video ID | (必填项)

playlistItemId.name: playlistItemId
playlistItemId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Playlist Item ID | (必填项)

regionCode.name: regionCode
regionCode.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
regionCode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Region Code | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

categoryId.name: categoryId
categoryId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
categoryId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Category Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

rating.name: rating
available_options: Dislike (值: dislike) - Records that the authenticated user disliked the video
Like (值: like) - Records that the authenticated user liked the video
None (值: none) - Removes any rating that the authenticated user had previously set for the video
